item.title: Finding My Writing Home with Hugo
item.description: A short story about how I discovered Hugo, why it fits my writing style, and how it helps me write freely without worrying about platforms, hosting, or complexity.

item.title: Signal Over Noise
item.description: A field guide to protecting deep work in a world of pings.
